data.suggestion: Maddie and Maeve discovered a photo booth and are now taking weird photos
Wrinry meeting Karen and Maddie for the first time, then they all become friends.
A concerned Maddie comforts a sad, drunk Keith after the loss of Natani.
Laura in a deep dive, surrounded by various ocean life. Subnautica themed.
Reni and Nora swap their behaviours. Nora becomes more shy and Reni more bold
Modern Natani sends provocative ankle pictures to Keith
Maeve for President.
Natani attempts to seduce Keith, as awkwardly as possible.
Keidran Adrakist Sisters: Karen and Maren
Young Alaric convinces a young Keith to sneak into the female Basitin bath house.
Mike getting hole in one at mini golf, to the annoyance of Evals.
Clovis zapped by the mansion's defense, but instead of thwarting it she becomes a chicken-like harpy.
Keith as Geralt training Maddie as Ciri at Khear Morhen
In combat, Natani tries using the Heart's Desire spell on Clovis, only to reveal the one who Clovis desires most is Brutus.
Human form Nora Daki
We've seen what Laura and Trace are like off set, what are "Keith" and Natani like? (Follow-up to Couples Off Set)
Cow Sam, freshly tagged, is up for "his" first milking, and on the job is non-other than Brutus. Brutus is excited to try something new. Sam, not so much.
Wisp possesses willow for the first time
Twokinds High: player character enters the locker room after hours, and discovers star jock Natani's big secret! (Both of them!)
Saria and Rose wake up after a wild New Year's party and wonder if anything happened between them.
Eric get hit on by a human woman
Double Date: Trace and Flora go on a date, with Sythe and Maren joining them.
AU - Rose (a-la old grandma) taking care of Trace and Saria's unruly/chaotic child
Frankenstein's monster meets red and he thinks a monster is attacking
Raine (halfkind) and Red are building snow-sneps in the garden!
Reni, in her anthro form, tries to explain to Nora that proportions affect balance. Nora responds by bwoming Reni, saying it's much more fun that way.
Maddie and Maeve pretend to be dragon slayers, to Lady Nora's annoyance
Flora accidentally bans herself with her own banhammer
Princess Reni meets Azymondias (Zym) from the Netflix Series The Dragon Prince
Maddie playing on thick ice
Adelaide telling a young Maddie bedtime stories about her epic feats of strength (and accidently making her insecure about her own body).
Twokinds High: The player stumbles into no-clothes Kathrin informing Mike and Evals about the new dress code and enthusiastically trying to convince them to join in on the fur-only trend.
Flora Daki Redux
Raine as Queen Elsa from the movie Ice Kingdom- (FROZEN)
Zen and Human Raine, bundled in a blanket together. Sitting by a window, sipping hot cocoa and watching the snow fall on a bustling cityscape.
Trace waking up between Saria and Rose, unaware the two are playing a prank on him
AU: A young puppy form Raine plays chase with young Reni.
Natani, Zen and Keith as the Spanish Inquisition from Monty Python. Nobody expects the Spanish Inquisition!
Laura eats a sandwich.
Kajortoq in the red dress after becoming the wielder of the red tezcatlipoca (episode 36)
Kat willow and Laura sitting at there dinner table recording a podcast
Professor Trace, teaching Defense against the Dark Arts, Showing off Willow the Wisp as an example of Will-o-the-wisps to his class of Templar apprentices.
Kat and VV Mike heading on a date together on a frosty evening.
Clovis' cousin Captain Jenny commands her motley crew
Maren hiking on a catamaran.
Laura Dakimakura
In Nora’s dreamscape, Raine finds Nora’s secret fantasies of finally seducing Trace.
Ghost Laura and Willow haunting people in the halls of the Legacy Estate
Twokinds High: rival sports stars Keith and Natani get in an argument. The player asks if this is how they flirt
Reni continues her naked streaking, turning a corner to find herself in the middle of town, with all those Tigers and humans looking at her.
Birthday Sketch... Nibbly keidranised kiss Scythe romantic pic
Clovis as a roman emperor, sitting smug on a throne.
Modern AU: Keith takes Laura to the gun range to test her FPS gamer skills.
Road Trip With Willow - Future AU Laura tells Willow “We’re gunna break your curse. Just tell me the opposite of your gut feelings.” Willow is terrified to be the ‘navigator’ again.
Beauty and the Beast - Trace as a white tiger and Flora as a human, in formal wear and dancing
Eric tries to get human Kat to cover up in public, but she resists - she doesn't see what the big deal is (Sequel to Human Kat - Casual Streaking)
Twokinds High: secret ending with Mike turning into VV Mike
Clovis' execution of Roan reimagined à la Captain Needa's fatal apology to Vader in Empire Strikes Back. "I will take full responsibility and apologize to Prince Clovis..."
Laura, Keith, and Natani having a double date with Trace and Flora, either having a picnic in the park or enjoying a romantic date at a restaurant of some kind.
Adult Maddie and Maeve in the “human only” bath, with Maddie once again flustered at the situation.
Kat doing that butt-wiggle-cat-pounce thing
Sam the dairy cow gets a collar of keidranification. Flustered about the result.
Young Rose Dakimakura

Towkinds Noir: A hardboiled detective Keith Kaiser is confronted by known gangsters Natani and Zen to bribe him into turning a blind eye to them and their bosses (Clovis) recent "work" that hes investigating
chibi Nibbly
Kat and Zen kiss in a shower
Wolf Raine wearing short tight shorts and short top, giving her most sensuous pose and wishing happy new year to fans
Female Luxray Keidran for the 25th Pokemon Anniversary!
Willow daki
Raine daki
Raine/Rose AU: Rose and Raine ring in the new year with Trace and Saria at the Legacy Estate New Years party
Human Flora and Kat wearing their keidran onesies
Adelaide Doom Slayer
Laura walks in, pleasantly surprised to see a shocked, newly transformed Very Vixen Keith
Flora decides to test Stoney to see if he'll be a good companion for her upcoming baby when it's born. She likes him! Good boy!
Kat surrenders to her canine side and rolls over for some belly rubs
Couple retreat: Keith and Nat shocked to see King Jade on the island with her new "boyfriend" (A Male dragon held against his will by the King)
Clovis changes every omnipoll entry to be a different Brutus pinup
Clovis, the Queen of Greed, did not take it at all well when Sunny, the Queen of Pirates, refused her deal where she would give Clovis half her income in return for ‘protection’.

The main four as survivors on a deserted island. Trace is cooking/burning fish, Keith is catching fish while Flora attaches the fishing hook to his pants without him noticing, and Natani is attempting to murder a shark that tore off his chest bindings.
Willow and ghost Laura go deep into the woods to meet Willow’s “Mother”
Alternate Universe: Nibbly the Squirrel-Keidran diplomat and her cute wolf buddy Mr. Sythe
Willow meeting Ori from Ori and the Blind Forest
Adrakist Flora meets Wrinry the Dragongirl
Flora tries to lick off the blue triangle on Trace's face but only manages to get it stuck to her tongue.
Keith reading to Natani and Natani becomes very interested in the story
Good Morning Mike (male)

Hunky Snep finally pops the question to Explorer Girl, who is ecstatic and filled with so many questions! Like why is he carrying her over his shoulder to the nearest hut, and what will happen once they get inside?
Flora pounces Trace too hard and he loses his memory again.
Undercover Maddie Finale. Maddie has safely made her way back home and is preparing to give a report on what was learned... But... What DID we learn???
Kathrin leans against a door frame, with a seductive look.
Flora massages Zen to help him get healthy!
Kat and Zen build a snowman, and discover that using mana crystals to help build it may have been a mistake
Half-keidran Raine meets human Holo from the “Spice and Wolf”.
Biological differences between Mekkan's main species (and Windstraw's)
Prohibition AU - Keith as a noir detective, following the lead of a hot tip.

After Euchre frees Raine and Mary Silverlock from the Templars, the latter two meet the formers cousin: Roselyn (alive and young). She takes them to her family in the Snow Wolf territory, and Raine turns in her Keidran form like her mom to blend in.
Bodyswap: Cat Raine and wolf Maren
Captain Jenny and Brutus raid the Na'Rella and Eric begs them not to take his paintings.
Measuring up sequel: Flora proudly declares that she'll untangle Kat using skills learned from escaping the Christmas lights. Trace finds them later, both tangled in the measuring tape.
Nib Nab Dragon Edition - Nibbly stealing clothes from human Nora and human Reni. Nora teasing Reni.
Genderbent AU: Male Human Nora tries to charm the Grand Templar FemTrace while she's at work at her desk. FemTrace is not very phased by the dragon's charm
Clovis hires I.M.P. (from Hellova boss) and gets into an argument with Luna about waiting in the lobby. Luna, terrifyingly, tells him to shut the @#$% up!
Hide and Seek with Ms. Nibbly! She is hidden somewhere in the picture
Zen Daki
Nora gets a taste of her own medicine when she's hit by her own curse and suddenly can't stop acting like a dog. Trace, finding this hilarious, wonders aloud what tricks she can do. "Don't you dare!"
Clovis hugging Brutus as a thank you after saving him from the asassins.
Solatorobo Cosplay 2: Laura dressed as Chocolat helming the Asmodeus
TwoKids: Young Trace and Kid Keith frolic in the snow with Kitten Flora and Puptani.
Bodyswap of Raine and Red. Raine is embarrassed because Red is a bit too curious with the breasts.
